name: Cats Them All!
description:
Ludum Dare 40: Cats them all!

Who told you cats fall on their feet? In our Ludum Dare 2017 game "Cats Them All" you play as a hunk of a fireman, rescuing kittens from a hard fall.
Rush to their aid powered by coffee and buns, hold them in your caring, well defined, sturdy arms until you find a carriage... Just be careful, the more you carry, the harder it gets!
You don't want to break the nice old grandma's heart do you?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Created by Veera Penttinen, Henni Syrjä, Sofia Toivola

Music: “Too Adventurous” and “Picket Fences” by Jay Man www.ourmusicbox.com
